item.title: Update command
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Love me plox, post:1, topic:374428”]This is what i have so far:

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerRights >= 3) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

But nothing happens when i try using it if someone could please tell me what i did wrong.[/quote]
what are you trying to update? the server overall? like as if you were to compile and run?

Read full topic
